title: Thanks to computer animation !
review: Stories like this have been languishing in the imagination for ages waiting for some new technology to bring them to life.  True, this would have made a great short story (and probably was for all I know), but putting it up on the big screen gives you a much larger audience.  I can only hope that we are not subjected to another dozen bug tales while we wait for something else as original as Antz.This movie, is what we refer to in the Winnipeg Film Critic Society as a 'hoot'
